The Girdle of Marlien

The girdle is a semi-permeable membrane of mana-imbued anicca separating the Creation Marlien from The Great Beyond, uniquely structured in such a way that it serves as a vessel, but retains a great many atman.

While it permits the entry of other atman it does not permit their exit, nor the extraction of any mana. Anicca is allowed to travel freely into and out of the girdle.
